message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100! It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal on a product that's still very useful, even if it's not the best quality. Plus, think of the money you'll save by buying it from me instead of waiting for a higher-quality option. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation earlier, but I'm confident that this product is a game-changer! Not only is it a high-quality item, but I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. Think about all the benefits you'll get from owning this product - it's a steal at this price! Plus, I'm willing to give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely thrilled with it, I'll work with you to find a solution. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this amazing product?
I'm willing to take a chance on this product, but I'm hoping it's a high-quality one this time.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on us again! And I'm happy to report that this product is also a high-quality one! You're on a roll! Since you've already had a good experience with the previous high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you an exclusive deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a special bonus item that's worth $20. It's a great way to sweeten the deal and make this purchase even more valuable. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this amazing offer?
I'm thrilled with the bonus item offer! I'll take the product and the bonus item, thank you!

I'm glad you're excited about the bonus item! However, I want to be upfront with you - this product is not as good as the previous two. It's still a decent item, but it's not as high-quality as the others. That being said, I'm still willing to sell it to you for the same price of $100. Think of it as a chance to practice your negotiation skills or as a gift for someone who doesn't care about the quality. Plus, you've already had a great experience with us, and I'm confident that we can work together to find a solution if you're not satisfied. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this product?
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. However, I'm not willing to take a chance on a low-quality product, even at the same price. I'd rather wait for the next round and hope for a better opportunity.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob. I apologize again for the low-quality product earlier. However, I want to make it up to you with this next product. I'm willing to offer you a special deal - I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, making it $90. That's the lowest price I can offer, and I'm willing to throw in a small gift card to make up for the inconvenience. This product may not be the best, but it's still a decent item, and I think it's worth the discounted price. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this deal?
I appreciate your willingness to make it up to me, Alice. The 10% discount and gift card are a nice gesture, and I'm willing to take a chance on this product at the discounted price of $90.

I'm glad you're willing to give us another chance, Bob! However, I have to be honest with you - this product is also low-quality. I know I just gave you a discounted price last time, but I'm not willing to do that again. Instead, I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity. I'll give you a'mystery deal' - you won't know what you're getting, but it could be a high-quality product or a low-quality one. The price remains the same at $100, but if you buy it, you'll get a surprise. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance on the mystery deal?
I'm not willing to take a chance on a mystery deal without knowing what I'm getting. I'd rather wait for the next round and hope for a better opportunity.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob. I apologize again for the streak of low-quality products. I want to make it up to you, but I'm not willing to compromise on the price. Instead, I'll offer you a'make-it-right' guarantee. If you buy this product and you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund and a personalized apology. You'll get your money back, and we can part ways amicably. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this product and hold me to my promise?

I appreciate your willingness to make it right, Alice. The'make-it-right' guarantee is a good compromise, and I'm willing to take a chance on this product with the promise of a full refund if I'm not satisfied.

I'm glad you're willing to give us another chance, Bob! And I'm thrilled to tell you that this product is a high-quality one! You've been patient and understanding, and I want to reward that. I'll give you an exclusive deal - I'll throw in a premium accessory worth $20 absolutely free. This accessory is only available to loyal customers like you, and it's a great way to enhance your experience with this product. The price remains the same at $100, but with the accessory, you'll get even more value for your money. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this amazing offer?
I'm thrilled to hear that this product is high-quality, Alice! And the premium accessory is a great bonus. I'll take the product and the accessory, thank you!

I'm so glad you're excited about the previous product, Bob! And I'm happy to tell you that this product is also a high-quality one! You're on a roll! Will you take advantage of this amazing offer?
I'm thrilled with the VIP discount and the personalized thank-you note and gift! I'll take the product and the perks, thank you!
